altername_name: エースコンバット3 エレクトロスフィアー ダイレクト オーディオ with AppenDisc
name: Ace Combat 3: Electrosphere: Direct Audio with AppenDisc
overview: includes: • Ace Combat 3: Electrosphere: Direct Audio disc item number: ZMCX-104 • Ace Combat 3: Electrosphere: Direct Audio with AppenDisc disc item number: SLPM-80453 • two booklets Ace Combat 3: Electrosphere: Direct Audio with AppenDisc includes digital content Movie Player, Original Movie, and save file Deadcopy. Composed by : Tetsukazu Nakanishi, Koji Nakagawa, Hiroshi Okubo, Go Shiina, Kanako Kakino and Tomoko Tatsuta Comes with an appendix disc that contains the complete data most of your planes and also allows you select and play any of the 52 missions as well as play any of the movie sequences. (Does require original Ace Combat Game Disc.)
